content:
In trying to work out a way to identify conformance features for renderers, I've come up with at least a summary view of the conformance "needs" of a specific quesitonnaire.
Here it summarizes from the content's of the questionnaire what SDC/Core/other properties are used by the form definition (and how many) so that compatibility with a renderer is easier... (wanting to automate the next part too)
image.png
Click on the Feature Usage tab for details.
https://qforms-server.azurewebsites.net/Questionnaire/bow-1000211-1
If you want to try it with your own form, post/put it to the server and give it a whirl.
Yes the columns on the right are dynamically read from the StructureDefinitions, and the blue text there is a distinct summary from the form definition.
